51-single: This game features tons of cute characters and heartfelt moments, presented in a simple visual style.
52-single: If you're looking for violence, fancy graphics, or even a game over screen, you won't find any of those here.

338-single: <p:player><f:side>(Somehow, I'm tempted to put the plushie in this basket...)
339-single: <p:player><f:sweat4>(... of course, I'd still rather keep it on my head.)
340-single: <p:player><f:sweat4>(... of course, I'd still rather keep it with me.)
343-single: <p:none>(A portable comms device. One new message has been received.)
344-single: <p:none>(You'll play it back once you're not so sleepy.)
347-single: <p:player><f:sigh>(No matter what happens, it'll always be a dining chair.)
348-single: <p:none>(A dining chair. You don't have anywhere else to put it.)
349-single: <p:player><f:sigh>(... there's something weird about this dining chair.)
351-single: <p:none>(A leaky faucet. You'd like to fix this as soon as possible.)
352-single: <p:player><f:sweat5>(If this was MY house, I'd fix this on the spot.)
354-single: <p:none>(Jars with spices used in fancier meals. They're full to the brim.)
355-single: <p:player><f:sweat>(Never open a stranger's spice jars. Learned that the hard way.)
357-single: <p:none>(The only dinner plate you'll ever need.)
358-single: <p:player>(A dinner plate. Looks like it's part of a set.)
360-single: <p:none>(Kitchen utensils. You see no reason to replace them.)
363-single: <p:none>(Plates and bowls stacked neatly in a pile. You don't use these.)
366-single: <p:none>(The fridge. You'd eat something if it wasn't so late.)
367-single: <p:player><f:sweat4>(Hope my... er, kidnapper doesn't mind me eating their food.)
368-single: <p:none>(A laser-action stove and oven combination. It's very clean.)
370-single: <p:player><f:sodesuka>(Guess I'm not the only one who doesn't know how to cook.)
373-single: <p:none>(A length of rope. It's been useful over the years.)
374-single: <p:none>(A pair of scissors, good for cutting ropes.)
375-single: <p:none>(A well-stocked pantry. With this, you'll be ready for doomsday.)
378-single: <p:none>(You feel this is exactly where it belongs.)
380-single: <p:player><f:side>(Looks like an extension for that dining table...)
382-single: <p:player><f:side>(There's a series of notes on this tackboard...)
387-single: <p:player><f:side>(I swear there was a box like that in the living room somewhere...)
388-single: <p:player><f:confused>(Was there a lockbox around here somewhere?)
390-single: <p:player><f:sweat5>(... I've found the lockbox, but I can't reach it...)
391-single: <p:player><f:sodesuka>(... weird how a library card needed a locked box.)
